segments.text: Looking into this kitchen, I observe the layout clearly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is on the right, with water flowing steadily.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman faces left, towel in hand over a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Overflow starts at the basin's edge, heading to the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle forms around her foot without her reaction.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To the left, cabinets stand open above the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy on stool extends toward the cookie jar inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His other hand grips a plate, body stretched high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stool tilts slightly, adding unexpected risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl nearby raises arm, palm open in wait.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Window above sink reveals a calm garden path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains pulled back allow light to fill the space.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stack neatly on the counter's far side.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole setup feels deceptively ordinary at first glance.
segments.speaker: PAR
